name: Casual Desktop Game
description: Casual Desktop Game is a fanmade revival of the old Desktop Destroyer game featuring community content.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1.5 GHz or more Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD chipcard or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 17 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
